short_summary: Cut mowing and groundskeeping services for various CFB Halifax sites.
description: Work under this requirement comprises the furnishing of labour, material tools, equipment transportation, and supervision required to complete the technical services to be described in the attachments.

full_summary:
====================================

**Grass Cutting - CFB Halifax**

**Tender Number:** WS3880168819-Doc3880351676
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
**Solicitation Number:** WS3880168819

**Publication Date:** February 23, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** March 21, 2023, at 14:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date:** April 28, 2023

**Description**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, invites interested parties to submit proposals for grass cutting and groundskeeping maintenance services at various sites in the Halifax area of CFB Halifax. The scope of work includes all labour, material, equipment, transportation, and supervision required to complete these services.

**Eligible Firms**
The tender is open to firms that meet the qualifications outlined in the RFP.

**Location**
The services will be carried out in the Halifax area of CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.

**Language of Tender**
The official language of this tender process is English. However, the contract will be awarded to the firm with the lowest price that meets the requirements.

**Trade Agreements**
Bidders may submit a separate claim for tariffs waived under Canadian trade agreements.

**Contact Information**

* Contact Person: Parsons, Richard (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: [richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL**
Direct links to the RFP can be found at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15510943?extsite=MTU1MTA5NDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15510943?extsite=MTU1MTA5NDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). 

**Attachment**
There are no attachments to this notice.

**Important Notes**
- This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) and will be evaluated based on the lowest price that meets the requirements. 
- Bidders failing to address all parts of the RFP may be disqualified. 
- The Department of Public Works and Government Services reserves the right to cancel or abandon the tender process if circumstances so require.
